Text:
thanks to the uploader. A/V 9. I wonder why it has the same rar file 31 times? Only needed to extract 1 of them to watch the show

yeah, not sure why it says season 5. This is the new season with the jets
It's not the same rar file 31 times. It's a rar archive divided into 40 segments. The segments are joined into one .avi file.
New to torrents.....When I extract and play on Windows Media Player I only get audio. What am I doing wrong. Thx.

@ gylgamesh5000 i only extracted 1 of them and got the complete file. i assumed i would have to extract all 31 to get the segments into 1 avi file. I dont DL rar files enough to know so thats why i asked. 

@crazytommy DL vlc media player. It will play anything and is better than WMP imo.

@Maynard64 only one part is in each rar file. when you extract one part, the program automatically extracts from the other rars in order to produce a complete extracted file.

@andzejek this is also the 7th season
